reviews.review:
Whoever is new to this game, leave. The game is filled with bots and hackers. And they keep coming despite of the "thing" people called VAC. 

If you want to be aggressive to go outside and cussing people, play this game for starter.

First Major problem: Hacking
- needless to say, this has been a problem for 3-4 years recently. Of course, patches have been issued, of course, changes have been made. All I see at this game is like a fucking Barbie doll who gets new dress every period, why her crotch looks like she's having a chronic menstruation problem.

Secondly: Bots
- like the above, but at least these automatons actually care about game objectives.

Third: Shitty Autobalance
- if you are the team MVP, Valve sees that u are worthy to put u into the other team, denying all of your hard-working efforts in exchange for a sh1tty 500 exp.

Forth: Team Balancing
- of course, Valve was such a fucking genius when it decided that "Oh look at these new players! Is it their first time playing? Well, let's queue them into a fucking team so they can compete with fucking bulldogs and bergies and all types of godly fucks who spent years to play.
- as for old players, it's fun to be matched with newbies. Don't get me wrong, you got to see them like yourselves past. They fight like no experience, obviously, but you have to LOVE when Valve put your sorry ass into a team of newbies, against what appears to be a horde of MGE and/or UGC modafukas.

Fifth: Lagging
- I don't know about other regions, but Asia servers are occasionally shite-to-play. The game attempts to pre-cache god-knows particles while u play, and that is a fucking shit, since it fucked ur your fps a lot. And that matter happened a lot recently.

After 9 years of development, from 2009, this piece of shit is no longer newbie-friendly. This game is fun, if you play with your friends, on COMMUNITY servers, because official servers are absolute shite.

Aight, how a bout some positive aspect?
- this game will shit on shitty setup, so consider buying new gears to match the shitty progress the game is currently on.
- the Community is the only thing that keeps this game alive, so cheers to the Community. But honestly, u people are trying to make cosmetics that literally make this game look like Fortnite. The game art is retro. But now? Cyberpunk futuristic shit.
I just hope, the items the Community made, has their description added with them.
- the currency this game provides is great. I hope in the future, this game will be completely used to be a bank for other games to use for trading, because of all reasons above, why the F not?

I once recommended this game. But now, I intend to cash out everything so I can move to a new platform, with new games and experience.

Team Fortress 2.

Tell that to anyone and they've most likely have either heard of it or played it.

From those silly Garry's Mod films to the high-quality SFMs, TF2 is everywhere, but most importantly, it's cherished in our many fond memories. It's just one of those games that years later, you can still pick it up and enjoy it with friends.

Need I say more?

This game is the most fun I've ever had. I've spend hundreds of hours playing so far, and I expect hundreds more. The art style, the gameplay, even the music - it all captivates you for one hell of an experience.
There is something for everyone here: the competitive players that just want to dominate the opposition, as well as those casual players that love nothing more than to dance with the enemy team, and everyone in between.

Truely one of the best games in my ENTIRE LIFE, AMAZING GRAPHICS, MECHANICS, AND  A GREAT FPS STORYLINE


10000000000000000000/10

ujdyj
Great Game if you want a game to never stop playing for years, so much to do, never get bored, amazing game. 8/8 would rate again.

Well.
After about 1500 hours i think a can give a conclusion.

By two words: go play Paladins or Overwatch.

Overall.
The game is totally abandoned by valve, filled with aimbots, lagbots and god knows whatever more. The game is also free, but in this case it's not a good thing, because it opened for cheaters to create another acoounts if previous was banned. Casual mode is trash, dont know what are ranks for, probably just for bells and whistles, so absolutely no balance and most games either you spawncamping the enemy or vise versa. Lobbies filled with 5-year old kids, screaming in their mics and just wasting a player slot.
There's no more fun on servers, the goal of almost every player is to insult everyone as much as possible. You can be kicked for taunting, leaving the keyboard for 1-2 mins, for your profile pic or a nickname, or wearing gibus, and no matter that you're the best player in your team. People become much saltier, and it's almost impossible to meet someone adequate. Also should admit that "after 9 years of development" and 10 eyars after public launch this game still has terrible tutorial, that teaches you how to move and shoot, but tells you nothing about basic unique game mechanics. This leads us to ton of people who say something like "how you saw me i was invisible" after you bump them. (And sometimes they kick you. Cos "you're a cheater"). Not gonna whine avbout "fair and balanced" random crits, but get ready to die 3 sec before match ends, after you destroyed a whole enemy team, by a random spam rocket, and then feel the taste of loosing. Random crits is more like persistent crits, a-hu-hu.
Competitive mode is abandoned by players, nobody plays it and if you'll give it a try you'll be waiting about 7-10 mins to start a match, that has the same problems as casual mode.
But hey, we have community servers? Ye, it's better place to play, but you still will suffer because of cheaters and salty people. And get ready for "cp_minecraft_neon_lowgrav_randomizer_10x_100x_1488x_allcrits_norespawntime_orange_trade" servers, because the search list filled mostly by them.
Oh, about updates. While i played this game, there was only one update that gave us 4 new weapons (please) and some maps and still, almost nobody use those weapons and nobody plays those maps. It's all about 2fort, upward, goldrush, granary and turbine. But we have a shitton of cosmetic cases tho. Go buy em.

There's also some pros like wonderful game mechanics and amount of weapons (added years ago) and strats you can use, but for now that's all.

So, if you're here and you're just a player, not a big trader, I want you to think about is this game really worth to play or try to play? I'm gonna be a bit lyric now. Like almighty Uncle Sam I want you to sell your inventory, buy some good games and leave this TF2 living corpse to rot completely.

Have a good day and don't play bad games.

이게임은 부족한게 없는 게임이다.
별로 어려울게 없는 게임운영 방법
패널티가 있지만 게임플레이에 별 영항이 없는 게임 매우 다양한 유즈맵 완벽하다.
하지만 하이퍼 FPS게임의 조상인지라 오래된 게임이다 그렇다 고인물이라는 중간 과정없이 썩은 물과 뉴비밖에 없다. 하지만 썩은물들은 진짜로 귀업게 뉴비들을 대해준다. 하나하나 부족한 부분을 가르처주고 실수를 해도 아무말이 없다.(중국인  제외) 그리고 인상적인건 적군 아군이 서로서로 교감을 자연스레 해 감정표현으로 놀수 있다는 것에 충격을 받았다. 특히 가위바위보 모션에 충격을 받았다. 좋은 게임이 확실하다 하지만 킬켐을 도입쫌 해주었으면 한다. 은근 핵쟁이들이 있고 (판 치지는 않음)핵 판매유저가 조금판치고 있다. 그 외에는 좋은 게임이라고 생각한다

I love this game and always will, and I highly recommend it to everyone. Therefore, please add an anti-cheat!

[h1]Introduction[/h1]

This game was one of the best FPS games I have ever played. The game was so good that I even got addicted before but Valve decided to killed this game with their hands. Here are the reason why.

[h1]Hackers[/h1]

Before i play this game back in 4 years ago, there weren't that many hackers but around in 2020. There are suddenly so many hackers and bots inside almost every games They ruling  the gameplay and made many people to quit the game.Even you kicked the hackers they could just rejoin. They keep spamming in chat, using aimbot spining and killed everyone in the server and Valve just doesn;t even care about it and still let them use cheats.

[h1]No more updates[/h1]

Before TF2 has bunch of major updates every year. Every updates are fun and interesting. Sadly, after the jungle inferno update in 2017. They are no more major updates. Only fixing patches and adding new case which is very dumb. The only way to make this game alive is keep making updates. Valve has billions of dollars but not even using it to do updates.

[h1]Valve has abonded this game[/h1]

After TF2 keep reciving different kind of issues, Valve decided to abonded the game and not do anything. TF2 has at least 15 memebers working but I only think there is actually only 2 to 3 working everyday. If Valve add more workers, they could do many things in TF2. Valve just want to care about CSGO since they made bunch of money in CSGO. We are like abonded by our own father.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

This game is not like the old TF2. TF2 is still a good game but not as good as before.

На базе на 2fort 5 инженеров строят город.
На центре моста стоит hoovy с сендвичем.
Рядом с мостом трое-четверо танцуют конгу.
Еще один с ними танцует казачок.
По карте бегает хеви в А-позе.
На балконе трайхард-снайпер убивает дружелюбных.
В воде плавает поджигатель с неоновым аннигилятором.
На спавне стоит афк демоман с идейным уклонистом на котором хентай-наклейка.
Рядом со спавном скаут бьет стену.
Танцуешь конгу, подбегает пироман и жжет всех подряд.
10 казачков из 10

This game never gets old.

Dont bother getting into this game the devs do not care. 
- We are coming up on 2 years with a matchmaking system that puts level one players in the same lobbies as level 150 players
-Ranked mode has been abandonded by the devs
-the dragons fury shoots a projectile so large you hit people standing behind yet the devs have not fixed this weapon since it released in october
- maps bugs that have been in the game since launch day still exist
-the devs have nerfed totally balanced weapons into the ground while ignoring the overpowered ones
- every update is the exact same material with a new coat of paint. they just release a set of contracts that give shit rewards and in the latest set of contracts they made it impossible to do more than one at the same time even though that was already a feature in previous updates (probably to pad the amount of time it takes to get through all the content)
-these updates are always filled to the brim with bugs
TLDR devs dont know what their doing, routinely release broken content, and dont really care about improving the game

I would recommend TF2 in a heartbeat. It has been around for ten years, and still has regular updates and patches. It has a (generally) good playerbase and a high skill cap. One of the few problems with TF2 is the lack of ingame help it gives to new players. Otherwise, good game all around.
Money well spent. 10/10
